segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is turning into a total disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is spilling out like a fountain gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is gross, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is clueless, polishing her plate while standing in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting wet too, what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids raiding the cookie jar on that rickety stool—filthy hands in there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's plate is probably dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waiting below, eager for stolen treats, so unsanitary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets with water streaming down, ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene reeks of neglect and sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the garden outside can't hide this indoor filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes near the water— they'll get soaked and dirty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look at this without feeling queasy about the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
